LanguageData.WVC_RB_Gene_GolemGestator: {0}'s mechanoid has finished the gestation process.
LanguageData.WVC_RB_Gene_Summoner: The package is already on its way!
LanguageData.WVC_PawnIsAndroidCheck: User must be human and/or genetically compatible.
LanguageData.WVC_AbilityValidation_ReimplantationChec: Reimplantation in progress. Wait for the process to finish before starting another one.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_General_DisabledIdeo: {PAWN_nameDef}'s ideology prevents {PAWN_objective} from using this ability.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SuremRetuneJob_Desc: You can change the xenotype that the serum is tuned to.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SuremRetuneJob_ChangeDesc: You have chosen the {0} xenotype. Are you sure of your choice?
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneGiverImplanted_Desc: {0} received the "{1}" gene, due to this {0}'s genes will be regrowing.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_GeneticInstabilityDesc: Pawn will automatically try to use the stabilizer when there are less than 3 days left until the next instabilization.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_GeneticThrallDesc: Pawn will automatically try to bite resurgents or use genetic stabilizer serum when there are less than 3 days left until the next instabilization.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_LetterTextThrallIImplanted: {CASTER_nameDef} has implanted a xenogerm into {TARGET_nameDef}, passing choosed genes onto {TARGET_objective}.\n\n{TARGET_nameDef} became a genetic thrall, thralls have their own strengths and weaknesses, but the main drawback of thralls is that in order to survive they need to regularly delay instabilization by absorbing the resurgent cells of living resurgent pawns.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ReimplantResurrectionRecruiting_: {PAWN_nameDef} belongs to {1} faction, and even if resurrected, it will not join your settlement.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsNotActive_WrongFac: Faceplate removed by augmentation or loss of eye
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsFurskin_CanBeDisab: Graphics can be disabled in the settings.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsRandom: This gene will be replaced by another gene.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsShuffle: This gene has a 20% chance to be replaced by another gene.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsAngelicStability: Removing this gene is guaranteed to kill the carrier.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsGeneticStability: Removing this gene causes temporary damage to the host's immune system.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_NewBack_GeneIsGeneticInStability: Removing this gene will temporarily speed up gene regrowing.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_OverrideExistingGenes_De: Does this sub-xenotype overwrite existing genes.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_IgnoreExistingGenes_Desc: Does this sub-xenotype add its own genes to the existing ones.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_RemovedGenes_Desc: These genes will be removed from the gene set if present.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_RandomGenes_Desc: Some of these genes can be added to a gene set.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_SubXenotypes_CanEvolveOn: Can this xenotype evolve into another xenotype if it dies.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_SubXenotypes_CanEvolveOv: Can this xenotype evolve into another xenotype over time.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_EvolveChance_Desc: The chance with which this xenotype evolves when special conditions are met.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SubXeno_SubXenotypesList_Desc: Xenotypes into which this xenotype can evolve.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneThrallMaker_ButtonDesc: Opens a menu where you can select the type of thrall for the implanter.
LanguageData.WVC_LetterTextGenesImplanted: {TARGET_nameDef} will be in a xenogermination coma for the next {COMADURATION} while {TARGET_possessive} body adjusts to the changes.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Extreme_GeneticInstabilityMessag: Due to genetic instability, {0} lost consciousness.
LanguageData.WVC_LetterTextSecondChance_GeneUndead:
Thanks to the {1} gene, {PAWN_nameDef} returns to the world of the living.
It will take {PAWN_objective} some time to recover, but if {PAWN_pronoun} dies again, it will most likely be permanent.
LanguageData.WVC_LetterTextSecondChance_GeneUndeadSha:
Thanks to the {1} gene, {PAWN_nameDef} returns to the world of the living. However, this caused a side effect. {PAWN_nameDef}'s genes have been changed and {PAWN_possessive} xenotype is now {2}.
It will take {PAWN_objective} some time to recover, but if {PAWN_pronoun} dies again, it will most likely be permanent.
LanguageData.WVC_LetterText_GeneRiseFromTheDead: {TARGET_nameDef} was resurrected, but this left a mark on {TARGET_objective}, now {TARGET_nameDef} is completely different.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_AbilityDisabledNoResurgent: {0_labelShort} does not have enough resurgent cells.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_AbilityGeneIsActive_PawnBaseline: Pawn must not have this ability.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_AbilityGeneIsActive_PawnNotHaveG: Pawn does not have the required genes or it is not active
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_AutoBaseDesc: Determines whether the gene will be triggered automatically.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_MechanitorShouldBeLich: The user must be a mechanitor and have the "Spore mechlink" gene.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneBabyTree_desc: If enabled, the baby will be spawned at the end of the countdown.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_WingsDesc: Allows you to switch between walking and flying.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DisplayStats_Scarifier_MaxS: Responsible for the maximum possible number of scars that a pawn can receive naturally.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DisplayStats_Undead_CanResu: Responsible for whether the pawn can be auto-resurrected after death.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DisplayStats_Undead_AlwaysR: The only way to kill is to destroy the body.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DisplayStats_Undead_CanRein: Responsible for whether the descendant of the pawn will appear in case of death. The minimum chronological age must be greater than {0}.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DisplayStats_Undead_CanShap: Responsible for whether the pawn's genes will change after auto-resurrection. This is influenced by the set of genes and xenotype.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_DustMechlinkDesc: Allows you to toggle the automatic mechs summoning. Mechanoids summoned in this way land in drop pods at a random cell on the map.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_Sporelink_ConnectWithResurg: Affects whether resurgent trees will react to the psionic presence of the gene carrier. Resurgent trees only animate golems if they can find at least one psionic presence.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_EternalHunger_HuntWarning: {0} is going to bite one of the colonists!
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_Gene_InvisibilityDesc: Allows you to turn invisibility on and off.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GolemBandwidthGizmoTip: A mechanitor can only oversee a golem if there is enough golembond to do so. Each golem consumes a different amount of golembond.\n\nGain more golembond by constructing <color=#f4e776>natural shrines</color> and <color=#f4e776>animus stones</color> or with help of <color=#6bb6bb>genes</color>.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_SporesBandwidthGizmoTip: A mechanitor can only oversee a walking corpses if there is enough golembond to do so. Each corpse consumes a different amount of golembond.\n\nGain more golembond by digging graves in <color=#6bb6bb>polluted soil</color> and burying creatures in them, or building <color=#f76d6b>skullspikes</color> and <color=#f76d6b>gibbet cages</color> or with help of <color=#6bb6bb>genes</color>.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ThrallsBandwidthGizmoGizmoTip:
Thrall master can create an unlimited number of thralls. But each thrall requires a source of resurgent cells for its existence. If the thralls are unable to <color=#95d0fc>cellsfeed</color> for too long, they will begin to die.

The main source of resurgent cells for thralls are resurgent pawns; the more <color=#6bb6bb>resurgent pawns</color>, the more thralls can be kept alive. <color=#6bb6bb>Genetic stabilizers</color> can also be used as an alternative.

Thralls cannot <color=#95d0fc>cellsfeed</color> on pawns with cells level below 20%.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_CustomLabeledMechlinkDesc: A neural formation resulting from genetic evolution or modification, similar to what can be obtained by implanting a mechlink.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ChosenLichDesc: Allows you to select the mechanitor to whom the new golem will be assigned.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ChosenWalkerDesc: Allows you to select the type of walker that will spawn the tree.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_AlwaysRandomizeDesc: If enabled, after each spawn, the mechanitor and the next spawn are randomized.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_XenoTreeXenotypeChooseDesc: Allows you to select the xenotype of the future baby.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_XenoTreeXenotypeChooseDisabled_O: First you need to choose a xenotype.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_Desc: You can choose any xenotype for gestation. Gestation time directly depends on the complexity of the xenotype and the gestation period of the gene carrier.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_Disabled: Cannot start the gestation process due to the {0}.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_GestationGenesM: The minimum matched genes must be at least {0}%
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_GestationGenesS: This person can gestate any xenotype due to its genetic characteristics.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_GestationWarnin: The gestation process will take time. During this time, the pawn will experience severe hunger and increased fatigue.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneXenoGestator_GestatorIsOnLet: {TARGET_nameDef} has started the gestation process, it will take some time. During this period, {TARGET_nameDef} will receive a number of debuffs.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_Desc: Opens a menu in which you can select any xenotype available in the game. The exceptions are androids and custom xenotypes.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_DisabledGenesRe: This person's genetic material is regrowing.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_DisabledPermane: This person will never be able to use shapeshift.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_DuplicateMode: This person shapeshift mechanites are in overclocking mode. The carrier's genes will not be changed, but instead a copy of the carrier will be created with the set of genes of the selected xenotype.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_NotPreferredXen: Xenotype does not correspond to beliefs.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_XenogermComaAft: Does a pawn fall into a xenogermination coma after a shapeshift. This can be changed with a special serum or under certain conditions.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_ShapeshiftWarni: The xenotype change process will take 2 days, during which time the gene carrier will be downed. Once completed, the carrier will not be able to change xenotype again for some time.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_ShapeshiftLette: {TARGET_nameDef}'s genes have been significantly changed, {TARGET_possessive} xenotype is now {1}. {TARGET_nameDef} won't be able to use {2} again for a while.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_DuplicateLetter: Due to the shapeshift mechanites overclocking, {TARGET_nameDef} was cloned. {TARGET_nameDef}'s clone inherited most of {TARGET_possessive} skills and traits.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_TrustedXenotype: This xenotype has been verified by the mod developer.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneShapeshifter_UnknownXenotype: This xenotype has not been tested, use at your own risk.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneSpawner_CustomButtonDesc: Allows you to select a product for the spawner gene.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_GeneSpawner_CustomButtonProductC: The product {0} spawned has been changed to {1}.
